text: Carlos Prates is a Belo Horizonte Metro station on Line 1. It was opened on 1 August 1986 as part of the inaugural section of the line, from Eldorado to Lagoinha. The station is located between Calafate and Lagoinha. ==References== Category:Belo Horizonte Metro stations Category:1986 establishments in Brazil Category:Railway stations opened in 1986
title: Carlos Prates station
